title: Google Image Search
content:
If the returned "identical" and/or "similar" images were not satisfactory, the "old" ("classic") version of Goggle Image Search had a search-bar in which I could add more information so more ("better") images could the returned.

But Google "Lens"(?) doesn't have that search-bar feature.

What am I doing wrong or how I use the "old" ("classic"?) version?

My browser is Firefox I'm using a desktop PC
creator: gcotterl

title: How to Manage Cookies in Mozilla Firefox?
content:
I am using Mozilla Firefox as my web browser and I have some questions about managing cookies. I would appreciate if someone could provide me with guidance on the following aspects:

Clearing Cookies:

How can I clear cookies from my Firefox browser? Is it possible to selectively remove cookies from specific websites while keeping others intact? Blocking Cookies:

What options does Firefox offer to block or limit cookies from being stored on my computer? Can I customize cookie settings for individual websites, allowing or blocking them based on my preferences? Managing Cookie Permissions:

How can I view and modify the cookie permissions for different websites? Is it possible to grant or revoke permission for a specific website to store cookies? Managing Cookie Expiration:

Can I control how long cookies are stored on my computer before they expire? Is there a way to automatically delete cookies after a certain period of time? I have explored the Firefox settings but I couldn't find clear answers to these questions. It would be great if someone with experience in managing cookies in Firefox could provide step-by-step instructions or point me to the relevant resources.

Please note that I am specifically interested in managing cookies within the Mozilla Firefox browser, so any instructions or suggestions should be tailored to this browser. Thank you for your help![https://ehsaasweb.com/ehsaas-program/ 8171 ]



Regenerate response
creator: ehsaasweb46
